lines.text: I mean, it could've just been an accident- he got shot, right?
If he was holding a candle at the time, maybe it touched something on the ground and started the fire.
Don't think so- he's way over there, see?
Not even where the fire was at- just outside the scorch marks.
So... maybe when he got shot, the candle rolled over to where it could start a fire?
And then magically appeared in his hand again?
